newsitem.title: CHINA: China bicycle output seen at 41 million by 2000.
newsitem.headline: China bicycle output seen at 41 million by 2000.

text.p: China's output of bicycles is expected to reach 41 million a year by 2000, the Market Daily said on Monday.
Exports of bicycles would climb to 10 million a year by 2000, the newspaper said without giving further details.
China has forecast its demand for bicycles in 1997 at 32 million.
China produced fewer than 30 million bicycles in 1996.
